content: **christmas socks 2024** are knitted top down on double pointed needles the cast on is made with two colors then you knit twisted rib and the pattern consists of squares and stripes for the squares there is a chart the socks are knitted with a heel flap and the toe is knitted with decreases and sewn together with kitchener stitch this year s christmas socks does not have a traditional christmas motif but focuses on some of the christmas colors and a slightly more graphic pattern the patter can be used very well as a basic pattern or just by changing the colors you get socks with a different look **size ** eu women sizes 37-38 39-40 us women sizes 6 5-7 5 8 5-9 5 **needles ** double pointed needles 2 5 mm us1 5 3 mm us2 5 **gauge ** 28 sts x 40 row = 10 x 10 cm 4 x 4 inches stockinette stitch needles 2 5 mm us1 5 **measurements ** the socks are measured unblocked from cuff to heel 13 cm 5 1 leg circumference approximately 24 26 cm 9 4 10 2 foot circumference 23 25 cm 9 9 8 **length of foot ** 24 26 cm 9 5 10 2 beware of that you need more yarn if you want to make the socks longer **material ** sandnes sisu 80% wool 20% nylon main color 1002 off white 50 g contrast color 1 4228 red 50 g contrast color 2 1042 light grey 50 g you find me as ainavdesign on instagram facebook and youtube
